roleset.name: NOT enhancing, growing greater

roles.note: I don't think all of these roles are possible with negative polarity item, but exist for symmetry.

roleset.note: Based on instances in Thyme and comparison to enhancing-j.01.

example.name: Arg1 only, probably very typical usage
example.text: - In reviewing the scans , I see no clear - cut benefit of trying to obtain tissue diagnosis seeing as how the lesion is nonenhancing and is rather sparse.
